title: WeDo.Exchange
author: WeDo.Exchange
content: WeDo.Exchange is a reliable and fast cryptocurrency exchange.We started our work with cryptocurrencies in 2018. We started as an offline cryptocurrency exchange from Telegram. We have established ourselves as a reliable, problem-free and proven exchange with market commissions and an individual approach to the client.Currently, we have decided to expand the range of services provided and provide the opportunity to carry out cryptocurrency exchanges online.Our service is aimed at providing exchange services with maximum speed and anonymity, high quality of service and optimal commission.Why choose us?Fast and reliable exchange.We will help and tell you if you are a beginnerHigh anonymity and securityIndividual conditions for regular customersWithout intermediaries and dark schemesCash withdrawal in various currencies (EUR, USD)Payments to Ukrainian (UAH) and Moldavian (MDL/USD/EUR) cardsRegular addition of new locationsGo to the website, choose the location that interests you and we will be happy to satisfy your need!Review serviceshttps://webproverka.com/domain.php?wedo.exchangehttps://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.wedo.exchangehttps://www.mywot.com/scorecard/wedo.exchangeWe are on BestChangehttps://www.bestchange.com/wedoexchange-exchanger.htmlhttps://www.bestchange.ru/wedoexchange-exchanger.htmlOur websitehttps://www.wedo.exchange/enWorking hoursOpen: Mon. - Sun.From 9:00 to 22:00 (GMT +3)

comments.author: Best_Change
comments.body: Exchanger wedo.exchange has been added to our monitor BestChange.We have analyzed information about the service’s work, its reputation, principles, and values of its administration and came to the conclusion that wedo.exchange satisfies the criteria for a reliable partner and can be listed in BestChange, among other exchangers.We sincerely hope for productive and long-term cooperation with this service. Despite the successful passing of all the checks, we will keep an eye on its reputation and the development of the client service.We recommend you always check the review page https://www.bestchange.com/wedoexchange-exchanger.html After an exchange, please share your opinion about the provided service with others.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: OP, your announcement should be in the Exchanges board rather than currency exchange board. If you can, please move this thread to the appropriate board. The option to do this is at the bottom left.Quote from: WeDo.Exchange on November 24, 2023, 08:58:56 AMWe started our work with cryptocurrencies in 2018. We started as an offline cryptocurrency exchange from Telegram.Forgive my paranoia but what shows that you started in 2018? By the way, telegram is also an online platform  Quote from: WeDo.Exchange on November 24, 2023, 08:58:56 AMWhy choose us?.....High anonymity and security.....Isn't the High anonymity thing so contradictory?On your exchange this is what I seeAnonymity and KYC/AML checks don't work hand in hand.
